name: Dragon Resistance
description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

ranks.description: Dragon resistance +6
Dragon resistance +12
Dragon resistance +20 Defense +10

name: Spread/Power Shots
description: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Spread Ammo and the bow's Power Shots and Quick Shots.

ranks.description: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Critical Eye
description: Increases affinity.

ranks.description: Affinity +4%
Affinity +8%
Affinity +12%
Affinity +16%
Affinity +20%

ranks.name: Ward of Wyveria
ranks.description: Reduces elemental and unique damage while in the Ruins of Wyveria.

name: Blast Functionality
description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

ranks.description: Lets you use blast coatings.

name: Normal Shots
description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo, normal arrows, and Flying Swallow Shot.

ranks.description: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Rapid Morph
description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

ranks.description: Speed +10%
Speed +20% Morph attack damage +10%
Speed +30% Morph attack damage +20%

name: Punishing Draw
description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Not effective while riding.)

ranks.description: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and gain attack +3.
Draw attacks deal a medium amount of stun damage and gain attack +5.
Draw attacks deal a large amount of stun damage and gain attack +7.

name: Paralysis Attack
description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

ranks.description: Paralysis buildup +5% Bonus: +10
Paralysis buildup +10% Bonus: +20
Paralysis buildup +20% Bonus: +50

ranks.name: Inspiration
ranks.description: Temporarily increases attack power when using effects like Melody Effects that affect companions in range.

ranks.name: Second Wind I
ranks.description: Grants an additional Stamina Gauge.

ranks.name: Second Wind II
ranks.description: Grants an additional long Stamina Gauge.

name: Poison Attack
description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

ranks.description: Poison buildup +5% Bonus: +10
Poison buildup +10% Bonus: +20
Poison buildup +20% Bonus: +50

name: Coalescence
description: Temporarily increases elemental attack power and status effects after recovering from blights or abnormal status.

ranks.description: When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup.

name: Constitution
description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

ranks.description: Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%.
Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Item Prolonger
description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

ranks.description: Item effect duration +10%
Item effect duration +25%
Item effect duration +50%

name: Guard Up
description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

ranks.description: Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Reduces damage taken by 50%.
Reduces damage taken by 80%.

ranks.name: Adrenaline
ranks.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

name: Antivirus
description: Once infected, makes it easier to overcome the Frenzy and increases affinity if cured.

ranks.description: Slightly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +3% if cured.
Increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +6% if cured.
Greatly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +15% if cured.

ranks.name: Hunter Gatherer
ranks.description: Increases gathering speed, and prevents knock back when gathering or carving.

ranks.name: Forager's Luck
ranks.description: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

name: Poison Duration Up
description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

ranks.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect by 20%.

name: Critical Boost
description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 28%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 31%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 34%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 37%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

name: Rapid Fire Up
description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

ranks.description: Rapid fire damage +5%

name: Charge Master
description: Increases element power and status buildup for charged attacks.

ranks.description: Slightly increases elemental damage and status buildup for charged attacks.
Increases elemental damage and status buildup for charged attacks.
Greatly increases elemental damage and status buildup for charged attacks.

ranks.name: Protein Fiend I
ranks.description: Temporarily grants attack +15 after eating items such as well-done steak.

ranks.name: Protein Fiend II
ranks.description: Temporarily grants attack +25 after eating items such as well-done steak.

ranks.name: Decimator I
ranks.description: Restores a moderate amount of health when destroying a wound on a large monster.

ranks.name: Decimator II
ranks.description: Restores health when destroying a wound on a large monster.

ranks.name: Wylk Burst
ranks.description: Increases recovery speed of stamina and red gauge when near Wylkrystals.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters and extends the dive-evade distance.

ranks.description: Enables skill use.

name: Horn Maestro
description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies. (Effect lost when you change weapons.)

ranks.description: Extends Melody Effect duration and increases the chance of larger heals from healing melodies.
Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

name: Recovery Up
description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

ranks.description: Slightly increases recovery.
Moderately increases recovery.
Greatly increases recovery.

name: Recovery Speed
description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

ranks.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Quick Sheathe
description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

ranks.description: Slightly increases sheathing speed.
Increases sheathing speed.
Greatly increases sheathing speed.

ranks.name: Hasten Recovery I
ranks.description: Regenerates a small amount of your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

ranks.name: Hasten Recovery II
ranks.description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

ranks.name: Blossomdance Boon I
ranks.description: During Blossomdance, adds special items to quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.name: Blossomdance Boon II
ranks.description: During Blossomdance, adds special items to quest rewards, and greatly boosts attack and defense.

name: Windproof
description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

ranks.description: Negates minor wind pressure and halves the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure and halves the effects of dragon wind pressure.
Negates all kinds of wind pressure.

name: Slugger
description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

ranks.description: Stun power +20%
Stun power +30%
Stun power +40%

name: Bombardier
description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

ranks.description: Explosive power +10%
Explosive power +20%
Explosive power +30%

name: Flayer
description: Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Upon inflicting enough damage, also deals additional non-elemental damage.

ranks.description: Makes it ever so slightly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it moderately easier to inflict wounds. Also deals slightly more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Also deals moderately more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it much easier to inflict wounds. Also deals more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it significantly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals much more additional non-elemental damage.

name: Slicked Blade
description: Temporarily increases affinity when wet or when inflicted with bubbleblight. (Wet and bubbleblight effects stack.)

ranks.description: Affinity +3% when wet, and +7% while afflicted with bubbleblight.
Affinity +6% when wet, and +14% while afflicted with bubbleblight.
Affinity +9% when wet, and +21% while afflicted with bubbleblight.

name: Blast Attack
description: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

ranks.description: Blast buildup +5% Bonus: +10
Blast buildup +10% Bonus: +20
Blast buildup +20% Bonus: +50

name: Dragon Attack
description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

ranks.description: Dragon attack +40
Dragon attack +10% Bonus: +50
Dragon attack +20% Bonus: +60

name: Cliffhanger
description: Decreases stamina depletion when climbing on vines.

ranks.description: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.

name: Marathon Runner
description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions that continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

ranks.description: Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%.
Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%.
Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Para Functionality
description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

ranks.description: Lets you use paralysis coatings.

name: Shock Absorber
description: Disables damage reactions when you hit a friend or when a friend hits you.

ranks.description: Activates skill effect.

name: Tremor Resistance
description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

ranks.description: Nullifies very minor ground tremors and halves effects of minor ground tremors.
Nullifies up to minor ground tremors and greatly reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies all ground tremors.

name: Artillery
description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

ranks.description: Moderately increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +30.
Increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +60.
Greatly increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +90.

name: Survival Expert
description: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables.

ranks.description: Restores 50 health.
Restores 80 health.
Restores 100 health.

name: Blight Resistance
description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.
Nullifies all elemental blights.

name: Fire Attack
description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

ranks.description: Fire attack +40
Fire attack +10% Bonus: +50
Fire attack +20% Bonus: +60

ranks.name: Super Recovery I
ranks.description: Allows the Health Gauge to continue to slowly recover up to the max value, even if there is no red portion.

ranks.name: Super Recovery II
ranks.description: Allows the Health Gauge to continue to recover up to the max value, even if there is no red portion.

name: Mushroomancer
description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

ranks.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

name: Ballistics
description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

ranks.description: Slightly extends range.
Extends range.
Greatly extends range.

ranks.name: Flawless Armor I
ranks.description: Reduces the damage you take by 5% when your health is full.

ranks.name: Flawless Armor II
ranks.description: Reduces the damage you take by 10% when your health is full.

name: Stench Resistance
description: Grants protection against stench.

ranks.description: Reduces stench duration by 50%.
Prevents stench.

ranks.name: Bubbly Dance I
ranks.description: Prevents major bubbleblight and increases evasion while afflicted with minor bubbleblight.

ranks.name: Bubbly Dance II
ranks.description: Prevents major bubbleblight and ups evasion while afflicted. Trigger minor bubbleblight by evading many times.

name: Weakness Exploit
description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster's weak  points and wounds.

ranks.description: Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +5%, with an extra 3% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +10%, with an extra 5% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +15%, with an extra 10% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points have 20% increased affinity, with an extra 15% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points have 30% increased affinity, with an extra 20% on wounds.

name: Stamina Surge
description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

ranks.description: Stamina recovery speed +10%
Stamina recovery speed +30%
Stamina recovery speed +50%

name: Guard
description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

ranks.description: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Focus
description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

ranks.description: Slightly increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 5%.
Moderately increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 15%.

name: Blindsider
description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

ranks.description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

ranks.name: Binding Counter I
ranks.description: Increases attack after recovering from webbed status, frostblight, being pinned, or a Power Clash.

ranks.name: Binding Counter II
ranks.description: Greatly increases attack after recovering from webbed status, frostblight, being pinned, or a Power Clash.

name: Aquatic/Oilsilt Mobility
description: Grants resistance against impairments to mobility while in water, oilsilt, or streams.

ranks.description: Negates the effects of muddy streams, and prevents you from being slowed down in water or oilsilt.
Also negates the effects of waves.

name: Sleep Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.
Prevents sleep.

name: Exhaust Functionality
description: Allows you to apply exhaust coatings.

ranks.description: Lets you use exhaust coatings.

name: Offensive Guard
description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

ranks.description: Attack +5% while active.
Attack +10% while active.
Attack +15% while active.

name: Ambush
description: Temporarily increases damage to large monsters with a successful Sneak Attack.

ranks.description: Attack +5% while active.
Attack +10% while active.
Attack +15% while active.

name: Critical Status
description: Increases abnormal status effects (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

Greatly increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.

name: Special Ammo Boost
description: Increases the power of the bowgun's special ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer, Thousand Dragons, and Tracer.

ranks.description: Moderately increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.
Increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

ranks.description: Temporarily grants attack +10 after a successful Power Clash or Offset attack

ranks.name: Powerhouse II
ranks.description: Temporarily grants attack +25 after a successful Power Clash or Offset attack

ranks.name: Scorcher I

ranks.name: Scorcher II

description: Increases attack power.

ranks.description: Attack +3
Attack +5
Attack +7

Attack +4% Bonus: +9

ranks.name: Luck
ranks.description: Increases quest target rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.name: Carving Master
ranks.description: Lets you carve one additional time from carcasses during quests. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Foray
description: Increases attack power and affinity against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.

Attack +10 and affinity +10% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.

name: Jump Master

ranks.description: Lets you use sleep coatings.

name: Counterstrike
description: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.

ranks.description: Attack +10 while active.
Attack +15 while active. Moderately extends effect time.

name: Critical Element
description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

ranks.description: Slightly increases elemental damage while active.

Greatly increases elemental damage while active.

name: Charge Up

description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

name: Airborne
description: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

ranks.description: Jumping attack power +10%

description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

name: Paralysis Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.

ranks.name: Thunderous Roar I

ranks.name: Thunderous Roar II
ranks.description: Extends the activation time of the Latent Power skill.

name: Piercing Shots
description: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Pierce Ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer and Thousand Dragons.

ranks.description: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

name: Burst
description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (Amount increased depends on weapon.)

ranks.description: On first hit, gain a small temporary attack and element boost, replaced by a larger boost after the fifth hit.
Hit 5 successive times for a moderate stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for a bigger stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost.

name: Whiteflame Torrent
description: Chance to deal additional damage after landing an attack.

ranks.description: Activates skill effect. (When used with Scorcher, does not stack but adds extra fire damage.)

ranks.name: Diversion
ranks.description: Increases the attention drawn to you when attacking a monster.

name: Geologist
description: Increases the number of items you gain at gathering points.

ranks.description: One extra item when gathering from bonepiles.
Additionally adds one extra item when gathering special items.
Additionally adds one extra item when gathering from mining outcrops.

name: Maximum Might
description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

ranks.description: Affinity +10% while active
Affinity +20% while active
Affinity +30% while active

name: Speed Eating
description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

ranks.description: Moderately increases eating speed.

name: Ice Resistance
description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

description: Increases evade distance.

name: Critical Draw
description: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks. (Not effective while riding.)

ranks.description: Affinity +50%
Affinity +75%
Affinity +100%

description: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.

ranks.description: Moderately boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

name: Stun Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of stun.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
Prevents stun.

ranks.name: Black Eclipse I
ranks.description: Infects you with Frenzy when against large monsters.

ranks.name: Black Eclipse II
ranks.description: Infects you with Frenzy and raises attack when against large monsters. Attack power increases upon recovery.

ranks.name: War Cry I
ranks.description: Using the <BOLD>To Victory!</BOLD> gesture moderately  increases attack temporarily to nearby allies. Greatly effects Palicoes and Support Hunters.

ranks.name: War Cry II
ranks.description: Using the <BOLD>To Victory!</BOLD> gesture increases attack temporarily to nearby allies. Greatly effects Palicoes and Support Hunters.

name: Flinch Free
description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

ranks.description: Prevents knockbacks.
Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.
Prevents knockbacks and tripping.

name: Load Shells
description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

ranks.description: Increases shell and phial reloading speed.
Increases shell/phial reloading speed. Gunlance loading capacity +1. Charge blade charges 5 phials on yellow gauge.

name: Blast Resistance
description: Grants protection against blastblight.

ranks.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.
Prevents blastblight.

name: Free Meal
description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

ranks.description: Activates 10% of the time.
Activates 25% of the time.
Activates 45% of the time.

name: Botanist
description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

ranks.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.

Additionally adds one extra consumable insect item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable mushroom item per gather.

name: Wide-Range
description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

description: The bodies of small insect monsters won't be destroyed, allowing them to be carved.

description: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

description: Makes it easier to break large monster parts, and increases damage dealt when destroying a wound with a Focus Strike.

ranks.description: Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 10%.
Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 20%.
Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 30%.

name: Intimidator
description: Reduces the chance small monsters will attack after spotting you. (Has no effect on certain monsters.)

ranks.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

ranks.name: Guts (Tenacity)
ranks.description: Boosts attack and lowers defense but lets you survive one lethal hit. Afterwards, boosts defense and res.

ranks.name: Master Mounter
ranks.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters and to wound them once mounted.

name: Elemental Absorption
description: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends)

ranks.description: While active, slightly increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 4.
While active, moderately increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 6.
While active, increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 8.

name: Protective Polish
description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

ranks.description: Grants no sharpness loss for 30 seconds after activation.
Grants no sharpness loss for 60 seconds after activation.
Grants no sharpness loss for 90 seconds after activation.

name: Iron Skin
description: Grants protection against defense down.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of defense down by 50%.
Reduces the duration of defense down by 75%.
Prevents defense down.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

ranks.description: 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +10% damage to hard targets.
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +15% damage to hard targets.
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +30% damage to hard targets.

name: Tetrad Shot
description: Increases affinity of bowgun ammo/ coatings from the fourth shot and attack of the fourth and sixth shots.

ranks.description: Slightly increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.
Moderately increases attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.
Increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.

name: Self-Improvement
description: Attack and defense increase as time passes while on a quest. (The maximum is reached after 30 minutes.)

ranks.description: Activates skill effect.

ranks.name: Fleetfoot
ranks.description: Increases movement speed while crouching, and makes it easier to escape large monsters' detection.

name: Opening Shot
description: Increases the bowgun's reload speed and increases the power of bullets when fully loaded.

ranks.description: Moderately increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.
Increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.
Greatly increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.

name: Stamina Thief
description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

ranks.description: Exhaust power +20%
Exhaust power +30%
Exhaust power +40%

name: Latent Power
description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

ranks.description: While active, affinity +10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, affinity +20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, affinity +30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, affinity +40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, affinity +50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Outdoorsman
description: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.

ranks.description: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.

name: Agitator
description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

ranks.description: Attack +4 and affinity +3% while active.
Attack +8 and affinity +5% while active.
Attack +12 and affinity +7% while active.
Attack +16 and affinity +10% while active.
Attack +20 and affinity +15% while active.

name: Palico Rally
description: Powers up Palicoes.

ranks.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

name: Bleeding Resistance
description: Grants protection against bleeding.

ranks.description: Reduces damage while bleeding.
Greatly reduces damage while bleeding.
Prevents bleeding.

name: Bind Resistance
description: Grants protection against webbed status and frostblight.

ranks.description: Allows you to quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.
Allows you to very quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.
Prevents webbed status and frostblight.

ranks.name: Honey Hunter
ranks.description: Increases the amount of honey you gain from gathering points.

ranks.name: Bad Blood I
ranks.description: Deals moderate additional damage while the Resentment skill is active.

ranks.name: Bad Blood II
ranks.description: Deals additional damage while the Resentment skill is active.

ranks.name: Fortify
ranks.description: Increases attack and defense after fainting during a quest. (Can be used twice.)

name: Hunger Resistance
description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

ranks.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Convert Element
description: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you dragon element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends.)

ranks.description: While active, deals extra dragon damage after dealing enough elemental damage. Slightly increases dragon attack.
Increases additional dragon damage and increases dragon attack.
Further increases additional dragon damage and greatly increases dragon attack.

ranks.name: Protective Veil I
ranks.description: Increases defense temporarily when using a specialized tool.

ranks.name: Protective Veil II
ranks.description: Greatly increases defense and resistance temporarily when using a specialized tool.

name: Peak Performance
description: Increases attack when your health is full.

ranks.description: Attack +3 while active.
Attack +6 while active.
Attack +10 while active.
Attack +15 while active.
Attack +20 while active.

ranks.name: Resuscitate
ranks.description: Increases attack when inflicted with ailments.

name: Thunder Resistance
description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

ranks.description: Thunder resistance +6
Thunder resistance +12
Thunder resistance +20 Defense +10
